Text: In order to meet the budgetary target of 17.3 per cent, the growth in direct tax collection will have to be 27 per cent in the remaining months of this fiscal, Mitra said.
Cause: In order to meet the budgetary target of 17.3 per cent
Effect: the growth in direct tax collection will have to be 27 per cent in the remaining months of this fiscal, Mitra said.
Sentence: <e1>In order to meet the budgetary target of 17.3 per cent</e1>, <e2>the growth in direct tax collection will have to be 27 per cent in the remaining months of this fiscal, Mitra said.</e2>
